price: እነዚያም ከእነርሱ በፊት የነበሩት አስተባብለዋል፡፡ የሰጠናቸውንም ከዐስር አንዱን (እነዚህ) አልደረሱም፡፡ መልክተኞቼንም አስተባበሉ፤ (ነቀፍኳቸውም)፡፡ መንቀፌም እንዴት ነበር!
arabic: وَكَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ وَمَا بَلَغُواْ مِعۡشَارَ مَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ فَكَذَّبُواْ رُسُلِيۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakadhaba alladhīna min qablihim wamā balaghū miʿ'shāra mā ātaynāhum fakadhabū rusulī fakayfa kāna nakīri
